title: Toggle Wear - Smart Watch
summary: Best Toggle wear to control operations on your smart phone.
description: Toggle wear lets you control your cell phones basic operations from the android wear without having to open your cell phone again and again. It provides the following important toggle features:1: Switch on/off Wi-Fi.2: Turn on/off mobile torch.3: Turn on/off silent mode.4: Turn on/off Bluetooth.5: Turn on/off vibration mode.6: Unlock device.7: Switch between landscape and portrait mode.8: Turn on/off location.9: Volume low-high.Please feel free to send us your feedback. Your feedback is important to us. Kindly rate us good. Your good rating keeps us going!
descriptionHTML:
Toggle wear lets you control your cell phones basic operations from the android wear without having to open your cell phone again and again. It provides the following important toggle features:
1: Switch on/off Wi-Fi.
2: Turn on/off mobile torch.
3: Turn on/off silent mode.
4: Turn on/off Bluetooth.
5: Turn on/off vibration mode.
6: Unlock device.
7: Switch between landscape and portrait mode.
8: Turn on/off location.
9: Volume low-high.

Please feel free to send us your feedback. Your feedback is important to us. Kindly rate us good. Your good rating keeps us going!
comments: using the Sony Smartwatch3 and Nexus 6p - the only toggles that synched correctly were the Wifi, orientation and Volume controls; Location did not create any response and the flashlight toggle removed and added  the options from the controls on my phone, but did not swithc on/off. Also, I'm aware that google prohibits mobile data toggles, but this is still dissappointing
Toggle for hotspot is really one I want A few of the toggles are already available from the watch. Would be good if we could configure the toggle list bit hotspot toggle is really what I want.
Nearly perfect. There are a few toggle Apps for Wear and this is the best. Just lacks phone network status and signal strength - would then be five stars.
Best one so far Really easy to use, it really works although l would love if they could add the Hotspot turn on function
I Uninstalled the app on my phone but it's still on my watch (huawei)
